headline: Manchester United Women sign Canada international Simi Awujo
summary: Manchester United have signed Canada international midfielder Simi Awujo on a contract through to the end of the 2026/27 season. The 20-year-old, who has 19 caps for her country, joins from the University of Southern […]

headline: Germany Women win Olympic bronze in tale of two penalties
summary: Germany took the bronze medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics with a 1-0 win over Spain and a last-minute Ann-Katrin Berger penalty save. Spain hit the crossbar twice in the first half, Teresa Abelleira from […]

headline: 2024/25 Adobe Women’s FA Cup early rounds drawn

headline: Crystal Palace Women sign Dutch international Ashleigh Weerden
summary: Crystal Palace have signed Netherlands international winger Ashleigh Weerden from Ajax with whom she won two trophies. She played nearly 70 times for the Dutch development age-groups, before her senior debut in 2019. After 60 […]

headline: Manchester City Women sign Japan goalkeeper Ayaka Yamashita
summary: Manchester City have signed Japanese international goalkeeper Ayaka Yamashita on a deal until the summer of 2027. The 28-year-old six-time Japanese top flight winner has 74 caps for her country, played over 100 times for […]

headline: Aston Villa Women sign Dutch international Chasity Grant
